data.text: @_RoyalEve_ @RoyallyPetite Yes  I agree , the “consort to be” is truly taking women a step back ... seriously

@mirandagousley @RoyallyPetite Jeez..what worries me most is that I have this (uneasy) feeling that this is the new narrative about "how women should be" & it´s getting worse the closer "Brexit" gets...is this the "post-Brexit" UK view on women? Obedient, dependent, opinion-less, child-bearing - that´s it?😳😧
@_RoyalEve_ @RoyallyPetite She is projecting a certain “someone” on her . Hard to fathom a 37 yr old self-made woman not solely relying on a man ... it’s unthinkable 🙄

@RoyallyPetite In all honesty: I find the story about Harry being her "crutch in so many ways" and "she´s very dependent on him" much worse! She´s her own woman, she listens to others who have more experience (which is intelligent) in order to learn quickly - so how is that "dependent"?🤔

@nic919 @geekygirl500005 @RoyallyPetite I thought of the same thing last night @katienicholl & some other UK royal reporters never asked Anne or Sophia 2 work less so  that Kate the future Queen Consort don't look bad so, why Meghan. Why? Because they fear Meghan's popularity increasing when she's out there working
@RoyallyPetite I read this story. Unless I missed it, I don't think those were Kate's words. I think this is messy talk here. Still, anyone trying to sideline Meghan to boost Kate is nonsensical.
@RoyallyPetite Harry please shave!😬
@RoyallyPetite This woman is the most ignorant person to say Meghan is a supporting cast, like she don’t want her to outshine Kate. Come on now, so you want Meghan to be lazy. Ridiculous
@RoyallyPetite I honestly don't see Meghan resting on her laurels.

@brenbrenchie @RoyallyPetite @Yuipretzz We dun know the repulsive #katienicholl is the female version of trump. Biggest liar! However, if a "lil" shining from Meghan can make Kate look dumb, well...WOW! #doesnotbodewellforthemonarchy

@RoyallyPetite @pastelfloras What is this crap about. Do we hear this about William and Harry? No, always something about the women. They should each do their own thing. Of course the focus is on Meghan due to being new to the firm.
@brenbrenchie @RoyallyPetite @Yuipretzz Plain and simple.u r so spot on!
@RoyallyPetite @Yuipretzz Is there a bigger idiot than Katie Nicholl? Tell Kate to step up, problem solved.

@RoyallyPetite If Kate and Meghan worked equally and had the same amount of engagements, the media would still spend more time talking about Meghan than Kate. Kate seems nice but it doesn't take much to outshine her.
@AFarray @RoyallyPetite Yes!
@royal_suitor @RoyallyPetite Yeah, i had to read it again. Because, it was confusing.
@RoyallyPetite Maybe William Hanson should worry about Meghan less and urge Miss Keen to step it up more.
@RoyallyPetite Horrible sentiment regardless but it came from William Hanson who's quoted in the article not Katie.

@geekygirl500005 @RoyallyPetite @katienicholl They're saying Meg shouldn't be seen working more than Kate. She shouldn't be seen wanting 2 work so much because Kate is the future Queen Consort & it makes Kate look bad. Instead of encouraging Kate 2 work more they're encouraging Meghan to work less. I've had heard it all now https://t.co/rZQvJETsWP
@aabmes @RoyallyPetite @katienicholl Lying #Katienicholl need to find another pastime, her BS articles on Meghan makes her look foolish and unprofessional.

@dazzlegal @RoyallyPetite @katienicholl In all honesty, I didn’t understand what she means. So Meghan “shines” too much on engagements so she stop being herself or stop working at all? What? Isn’t that her job now?
@RoyallyPetite Wow wow wow

@geekygirl500005 @RoyallyPetite @katienicholl I can't believe they R encouraging Meghan 2 not work as hard so that she doesn't outshine Kate. They have no faith in Kate. So instead of encouraging her 2 step up 2 the plate, they want Meg 2 not work as hard so Kate doesn't look bad. I say, 2 damn bad. Meg will continue 2 shine https://t.co/n2ERf7Cqjn
@RoyallyPetite This is another level cringe. C’mon @katienicholl
